title: Welcome to Omega Chi Epsilon
text:
Welcome!
This is the new home page for Purdue’s Chemical Engineering Honors Society.

title: About Us
About Us
text:
Our Purpose

Promote high scholarship
Encourage original investigation in chemical engineering
Recognize character, integrity, and leadership
Advocate and support community service

title: About Us
text:
Chapter Values



Character
We value strong moral character and ethical behavior in all our members.




Integrity
Integrity is at the core of our academic and professional pursuits.




Leadership
We encourage leadership and initiative in service to the community.
